law.catch_line: Standards for asbestos abatement or removal.
law.text: Notwithstanding any statute or regulation to the contrary, the facilities of those entities defined in KRS 278.010(3) shall be required to comply solely with the National Emission Standards for Asbestos, of the United States Environmental Protection Agency and applicable rules and regulations of the United States Occupational Safety and Health Administration, and the Kentucky Occupational Safety and Health Standards Board, for purposes of asbestos abatement or removal.
law.history: Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 413, sec. 4, effective April 8, 1988.
